attributes.action: Retain British Summer Time [BST] for Winter 20/21
attributes.background: Due to the probable continuing lockdown the Government should take the one-off emergency measure to retain British Summer Time for the coming winter. This measure could be of enormous benefit to millions of people.

departments.name: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
